p: Core material (ethanolic extract and essential oil) for spray-drying was prepared as described in section materials and methods, using extraction methods that were developed before to achieve the highest quantities of rosmarinic acid (RA), chlorogenic acid (CA), apigenin (AP), elsholtzia ketone (EK), dehydroelsholtzia ketone (DK), and total phenolics content (TPC) [ 34].
